column5: I have a 1968-64 3.9 single mercury motor that I just got, I need anyone else have one here I need some info. on the motor
Welcome to the community Brad  There are alot of knowledgable outboard guys here. What kind of assistance do you need?
Chris Cross from this board may be able to help. You should contact him.  Good luck.
thanks guys, I need to know how to take the flywheel off and the heli-coil.
Call me at the office 705 549 8920. I'll talk you thru it. CX
Mighty nice of you Chris....most would say bring it by the shop. $ $
welcome brad ..nice name anyway i got a 68 6hp many links in my favorites if CX CANT HELP U
